name: Apple Watch Series 4, 5, 6, SE, & 7
description:
Series 7 45mm and 41mm case materials: 10

Series 4, 5, 6, SE 44mm and 40mm case materials: 9

120 small bands

79 large bands


Total combos possible 3700+


All photos are taken directly from Apple's website or the Way Back Machine (web.archive.org/)

1000x1000 pixel resolution for all the bands and cases.

----

Band types available:

  • Hermes
  • Braided Solo Loop
  • Nike Sport Loop
  • Nike Sport Band
  • Solo Loop
  • Milanese Loop
  • Link Bracelet
  • Leather Link
  • Modern Buckle (small only)
  • Sport Loop

----

Dec 21 2021 update:

Added home screen layout created by @josedevian to make it easier to mock your app icon.

----

Dec 22 2021 update:

Used the wayback machine to add about 50 more watch bands and add stainless steel, titanium, and ceramic cases to the 40mm and 44mm cases.

----

March 18 2022 update:

Added about 30 new watch bands added for the Spring 2022 collection
